original: akāro vāsudevaḥ syād ākāraś ca pitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: akāraḥ vāsudevaḥ syāt ākāraḥ ca pitāmahaḥ

original: pūjāyām api māṅgalye ākāraḥ parikīrttitaḥ // PEk_1
analyzed: pūjāyām api māṅgalye ākāraḥ parikīrttitaḥ pek

original: ikāro ucyate kāmo lakṣmī rīkāra ucyate /
analyzed: ikāraḥ ucyate kāmaḥ lakṣmī rīkāraḥ ucyate

original: ukāraḥ śaṅkaraḥ prokta ūkāraś cāpi rakṣaṇe // PEk_2
analyzed: ukāraḥ śaṅkaraḥ proktaḥ ūkāraḥ ca api rakṣaṇe

original: ṛkāro devamātā syād ṝkāro danujaprasūḥ /
analyzed: ṛkāraḥ devamātā syāt ṝkāraḥ danujaprasūḥ

original: ḷkāro devayoniḥ syāl ḹr mātā sadbhir ucyate // PEk_3
analyzed: ḷkāraḥ devayoniḥ syāt ḥ mātā sadbhiḥ ucyate

original: ekāraḥ kathito viṣṇur aikāraś ca maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: ekāraḥ kathitaḥ viṣṇuḥ aikāraḥ ca maheśvaraḥ

original: okāras tu bhaved brahmā aukāro rudra ucyate // PEk_4
analyzed: okāraḥ tu bhavet brahmā aukāraḥ rudraḥ ucyate

original: aṃ syāc ca paramaṃ brahma aḥ syād devo maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: aṃ syāt ca paramam brahma aḥ syāt devaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: kaḥ prajāpatir uddiṣṭo ko vāyur iti śabditaḥ // PEk_5
analyzed: kaḥ prajāpatiḥ uddiṣṭaḥ kaḥ vāyuḥ iti śabditaḥ

original: kaś cātmā ca samākhyātaḥ kaḥ prakāśa udāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ ca ātmā ca samākhyātaḥ kaḥ prakāśaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: kaṃ śiro jalam ākhyātaṃ kaṃ sukhaṃ ca prakīrtitam // PEk_6
analyzed: kam śiraḥ jalam ākhyātam kam sukham ca prakīrtitam

original: pṛthivyāṃ kuḥ samākhyātā kutsāyāṃ kuḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: pṛthivyām kuḥ samākhyātā kutsāyām kuḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: kham indriyaṃ samākhyātaṃ kham ākāśam udāhṛtam // PEk_7
analyzed: kham indriyam samākhyātam kham ākāśam udāhṛtam

original: khaṃ svarge ca samākhyātaṃ khaṃ sarpe ca prakīrtitaṃ /
analyzed: kham svarge ca samākhyātam kham sarpe ca prakīrtitam

original: tathā śvabhre ca khaṃ prāhuḥ khaṃ śūnye ca prakīrttitam // PEk_8
analyzed: tathā śvabhre ca kham prāhuḥ kham śūnye ca prakīrttitam

original: go gaṇapatir uddiṣṭo go gandharvaḥ prakīrttitaḥ /
analyzed: go gaṇapatiḥ uddiṣṭaḥ go gandharvaḥ prakīrttitaḥ

original: gaṃ gītaṃ gā ca gāthā syād gaur dhenur gauḥ sarasvatī // PEk_9
analyzed: gam gītam gā ca gāthā syāt gauḥ dhenuḥ gauḥ sarasvatī

original: gaur mātāpi samuddiṣṭā pṛthivyāṃ gauḥ prakīrttitā /
analyzed: gauḥ mātā api samuddiṣṭā pṛthivyām gauḥ prakīrttitā

original: gho ghaṇṭāyāṃ samākhyātaḥ kiṅkiṇī ghā prakīrttitā // PEk_10
analyzed: ghaḥ ghaṇṭāyām samākhyātaḥ kiṅkiṇī ghā prakīrttitā

original: upamā ghā samākhyātā kusvare ghuḥ prakīrttitaḥ /
analyzed: upamā ghā samākhyātā kusvare ghuḥ prakīrttitaḥ

original: hanane ghā samākhyātā gandhane ghaḥ prakīrttitaḥ // PEk_11
analyzed: hanane ghā samākhyātā gandhane ghaḥ prakīrttitaḥ

original: ṅakāro bhairavaḥ khyāto ṅakāro viṣaye smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ṅakāraḥ bhairavaḥ khyātaḥ ṅakāraḥ viṣaye smṛtaḥ

original: cakāraś candramāḥ khyātas taskaraś ca prakīrttitaḥ // PEk_12
analyzed: cakāraḥ candramāḥ khyātaḥ taskaraḥ ca prakīrttitaḥ

original: nirmalaṃ chaṃ samākhyātaṃ taraṇī chaḥ prakīrttitaḥ /
analyzed: nirmalam cham samākhyātam taraṇī chaḥ prakīrttitaḥ

original: chedane chaḥ samākhyāto vidvadbhiḥ śabdakovidaiḥ // PEk_13
analyzed: chedane chaḥ samākhyātaḥ vidvadbhiḥ śabda kovidaiḥ

original: vegite jaḥ samākhyāto jaghane jaḥ prakīrttitaḥ /
analyzed: vegite jaḥ samākhyātaḥ jaghane jaḥ prakīrttitaḥ

original: jetā ca jaḥ samākhyātaḥ prasiddhaiḥ śabdakovidaiḥ // PEk_14
analyzed: jetā ca jaḥ samākhyātaḥ prasiddhaiḥ śabda kovidaiḥ

original: jhaṃjhāvāte jhakāraḥ syān naṣṭe jhaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: jhaṃjhā vāte jhakāraḥ syāt naṣṭe jhaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ

original: ñakāro gāyane prokto ñakāro ghargharadhvanau // PEk_15
analyzed: ñakāraḥ gāyane proktaḥ ñakāraḥ gharghara dhvanau

original: ṭaṅkāre ṭaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ṭā ṭo dhvanau ca prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: ṭaṅkāre ṭaḥ pṛthivyām ṭā ṭaḥ dhvanau ca prakīrtitaḥ

original: ṭho maheśvara ākhyātaḥ śūnye ca ṭhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_16
analyzed: ṭhaḥ maheśvare ākhyātaḥ śūnye ca ṭhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: bṛhaddhvanau ca ṭhaḥ proktas tathā candrasya maṇḍale /
analyzed: bṛhaddhvanau ca ṭhaḥ proktaḥ tathā candrasya maṇḍale

original: ḍakāraḥ śaṅkaraḥ proktas trāsadhvanyoḥ prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_17
analyzed: ḍakāraḥ śaṅkaraḥ proktaḥ trāsa dhvanyoḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: ḍhakāraḥ kīrtitā ḍhakkā nirguṇe ca dhvanāv api /
analyzed: ḍhakāraḥ kīrtitāḥ ḍhakkāḥ nirguṇe ca dhvanau api

original: ṇakāraḥ kīrtito jñāne nirṇaye 'pi prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_18
analyzed: ṇakāraḥ kīrtitaḥ jñāne nirṇaye pi prakīrtitaḥ

original: takāraḥ kathitaś cauraḥ kroḍe pucche prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: takāraḥ kathitaḥ cauraḥ kroḍe pucche prakīrtitaḥ

original: śiloccaye thakāraḥ syāt thakāro bhayarakṣaṇe // PEk_19
analyzed: śiloccaye thakāraḥ syāt thakāraḥ bhaya rakṣaṇe

original: daṃ kalatre samākhyātaṃ do dānacchedadhātuṣu /
analyzed: dam kalatre samākhyātam daḥ dāna cheda dhātuṣu

original: dhaṃ dhane ca dhaneśe dho dhā dhātari nidarśitaḥ // PEk_20
analyzed: dham dhane ca dhaneśe dhaḥ dhāḥ dhātari nidarśitaḥ

original: dhiṣaṇā dhīḥ samākhyātā dhūś ca syād bhāracintayoḥ /
analyzed: dhiṣaṇā dhīḥ samākhyātā dhūḥ ca syāt bhāra cintayoḥ

original: nakāraḥ sugate bandhe nuḥ stutau ca prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_21
analyzed: nakāraḥ sugate bandhe nuḥ stutau ca prakīrtitaḥ

original: netā nīś ca samākhyātas taraṇau nauḥ prakīrtitā /
analyzed: netā nīḥ ca samākhyātaḥ taraṇau nauḥ prakīrtitā

original: nakāraḥ saugate buddhau stuto sūrye ca kīrtitaḥ // PEk_22
analyzed: nakāraḥ saugate buddhau sūrye ca kīrtitaḥ

original: naśabdaḥ svāgate bandhau vṛkṣe sūrye ca kīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: na śabdaḥ svāgate bandhau vṛkṣe sūrye ca kīrtitaḥ

original: paḥ kuberaḥ samākhyātaḥ paścime ca prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_23
analyzed: paḥ kuberaḥ samākhyātaḥ paścime ca prakīrtitaḥ

original: pavane paḥ samākhyātaḥ pāḥ pāne pāś ca pātari /
analyzed: pavane paḥ samākhyātaḥ pāḥ pāne pāḥ ca pātari

original: kaphe vāte phakāraḥ syāt tathāhvāne prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_24
analyzed: kaphe vāte phakāraḥ syāt tathā āhvāne prakīrtitaḥ

original: jhaṃjhāvāte phakāraḥ syād akṣare ca prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: jhaṃjhāvāte phakāraḥ syāt akṣare ca prakīrtitaḥ

original: kope phiś ca samākhyātas tathā niṣphalabhāṣaṇe // PEk_25
analyzed: kope phiḥ ca samākhyātaḥ tathā niṣphala bhāṣaṇe

original: vakṣaḥsthale ca baḥ prokto gadāyāṃ samudāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vakṣaḥsthale ca baḥ proktaḥ gadāyām samudāhṛtaḥ

original: nakṣatraṃ bhaṃ budhaiḥ proktaṃ bhramare bhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // PEk_26
analyzed: nakṣatram bham budhaiḥ proktam bhramare bhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: bhā dīptir api bhūr bhūmir bhīr bhayaṃ kathitā budhaiḥ /
analyzed: bhā dīptiḥ api bhūḥ bhūmiḥ bhīḥ bhayam kathitā budhaiḥ

original: maḥ śivaś candramā vedhā mā ca lakṣmīḥ prakīrtitā // PEk_27
analyzed: maḥ śivaḥ candramāḥ vedhāḥ mā ca lakṣmīḥ prakīrtitā
